explanation: [0-0] A piece of raw pork is placed on a white chopping board.
[0-2] At this moment, one hand presses the pork, and the other hand holds a knife against it, cutting a slit in the middle of the meat.

They are both looking forward with their mouths wide open in surprise. Then the scene changes, and the man in blue is playing a guitar. The man in white is holding a wooden spoon to his mouth with his left hand, looking forward and singing with a smile.
